text:
"As you can see from their MCs and such, these girls,
who seem to have completely different personalities"

"One of Straylight’s biggest charms is how they
become one in their performances."

"I came for some self-training for
the rehearsal in the evening"

"And guess what! Asahi-chan and
Fuyuko-chan were here too!"

Oh......! You didn’t plan that, right?
Why are they there?

"And Asahi-chan wanted to try
something she thought of!"

Haha, I see.
That’s quite the coincidence.

‘I just wanted to tell you that, so I’m hanging up now～
　Bye-bye’
(They’re usually so different from each other, but)

(Like how their individual practice sessions
overlap like this)
